contents.text: Thank you for calling AEye, the East Bay’s pioneer in artificial perception and creator of iDAR, our intelligent data collection system for autonomous transportation.
For sales and product information about iDAR and our perception hardware, press 1.
To request a demonstration and discuss deployment options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a demonstration of iDAR and review deployment options and costs.
Arrange a demonstration of iDAR for my autonomous convoy project and discuss deployment options.
Schedule a live demonstration of the iDAR perception system and review deployment architecture for our autonomous fleet.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of the iDAR system and discuss how to deploy it.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of the iDAR perception system for my lab research.

contents.text: To speak directly with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a sales rep about ordering iDAR units and delivery timelines.
Speak with a sales representative about pricing and financing for bulk iDAR units for my defense logistics startup.
Obtain detailed pricing, licensing, and bulk purchase options for AEye’s iDAR sensors.
I want to speak with a sales representative about purchasing iDAR.
I need information on academic pricing and licensing for AEye’s iDAR hardware.

contents.text: For technical support and service assistance, press 2.
If you need help with installation and system setup, press 1.
One moment please, we’re connecting you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need help installing and configuring our new iDAR system.
Get step-by-step guidance to install iDAR hardware on my test vehicle in the field.
Get assistance configuring the iDAR unit, integrating it with our vehicle’s CAN bus, and performing initial calibration.
I’m having trouble installing my iDAR hardware and need step-by-step setup help.
I need assistance installing and configuring the iDAR unit on our autonomous vehicle platform.

contents.text: For troubleshooting, maintenance, and repairs, press 2.
Please hold while we route your call to our support engineers.

navigationGoals: I need troubleshooting support for a malfunctioning iDAR sensor.
Troubleshoot calibration issues and schedule maintenance for my deployed iDAR sensors.
Diagnose intermittent point-cloud dropouts on our iDAR array and troubleshoot sensor hardware issues.
I need assistance troubleshooting and repairing my iDAR unit.
I’m encountering sensor errors with my iDAR system and need troubleshooting and repair support.
